name: CommCare
description: CommCareHQ is the server backend for CommCare, the world's largest platform for designing, managing, and deploying robust Offline First mobile applications to frontline workers worldwide

name: CommCare Android
description: Offline First Android software client for CommCare, the world's largest platform for designing, managing, and deploying robust mobile applications to frontline workers worldwide

name: CommCare Cloud
description: Tools for standing up and managing a CommCare HQ server environment

name: HealthSites
description: Building an open data commons of health facility data with OpenStreetMap

name: Covid-19 Tracking
description: The COVID Tracking Project collects information from 50 US states, the District of Columbia, and 5 other U.S. territories to provide the most comprehensive testing data we can collect for the novel coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2.

name: Open Crisis Board
description: OpenCrisisBoard (OCB) is a lightweight forum application that enables social-backed, accessible communication around crisis-related topics via simple forum boards.

name: Covid-19 Japan
description: The state of the infection of the new coronavirus (COVID19) in Japan was summarized visually from a press release from the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare.

name: Covis-19 Scenarios
description: Models of COVID-19 outbreak trajectories and hospital demand

name: Reach4Help
description: People who are at high risk from COVID-19 or are quarantined are unable to leave their houses and obtain necessities like food and medical supplies without putting themselves or others at risk. To mitigate this, many local groups and organizations, big and small, have started initiatives to try and get resources such as food and medicine to these people, and help out with important tasks such as walking dogs.

name: Intelehealth
description: Intelehealth is a telemedicine & case management app that supports patients and frontline health workers with a digital assistant called 'Ayu' for triage and risk assessment. It connects them with remote doctors over telemedicine (audio/video calls) in order to provide care for patients in hard-to-reach situations.

name: Coronavirus Tracker
description: Dashboard to track the spread of the coronavirus, based on three data sources, built with shinyMobile and echarts4r.

name: EnPremiereLigne
description: Face à l’épidémie de Covid-19, certains d'entre nous sont en première ligne de la lutte contre le virus. Soyons présents pour eux et leurs familles.

name: 2019 Wuhan Coronavirus data
description: This public repository archives data over time from various public sources on the web.

name: Covid
description: Covid-19 patients' self-monitoring at home via forms sent by SMS

name: Low Cost OS Ventilator
description: Low-Cost Open-Source Ventilator-ish Device

name: CoronaTracker
description: Keeps track of the development of Wuhan Corona virus

name: CoronaTracker
description: Coronavirus tracker app for iOS & macOS with maps & charts

name: Tokyo Covid-19
description: Tokyo COVID-19 Task Force website

name: Chime
description: The COVID-19 Hospital Impact Model for Epidemics

name: Nextstrain
description: Nextstrain is an open-source project to harness the scientific and public health potential of pathogen genome data. We provide a continually-updated view of publicly available data alongside powerful analytic and visualization tools for use by the community.

name: Midas 2019 Coronavirus
description: The MIDAS Coordination Center released an online portal for COVID-19 modeling research. The portal improves navigation and search of COVID-19 information.

name: DHIS2
description: DHIS2 has released a digital data package to accelerate case detection, situation reporting, active surveillance and response for COVID-19.

name: NovelCovid API
description: API for Current cases and more stuff about COVID-19 or the Novel Coronavirus Strain

name: Covid-19 Analysis
description: This repo is for analysis on the corona virus / covid-19 that will extract the latest data and generate reports.

name: Open Covid-19 France
description: Consolidation des données de sources officielles concernant l'épidémie de COVID-19

name: Coronavirus Tracker API
description: 🦠 A simple and fast (< 200ms) API for tracking the global coronavirus (COVID-19, SARS-CoV-2) outbreak. It's written in python using the 🍼 Flask framework.

name: Openair
description: We are working on medical devices, to have a fast and easy solution that can be reproduced and assembled locally worldwide.

name: Community Health Toolkit
description: Medic Mobile's Core Framework makes it faster to build responsive, offline-first digital health apps that equip health workers to provide better care in their communities. It is a central resource of the Community Health Toolkit.

name: Covid-19 Germany
description: All officially confirmed cases of infection in Germany. Listed by case number, date, federal state, latitude, longitude, source.

name: 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19
description: This is the data repository for the 2019 Novel Coronavirus Visual Dashboard operated by the Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CSSE).

name: COVID-19 Italia - Monitoraggio situazione
description: Sito del Dipartimento della Protezione Civile - Emergenza Coronavirus: la risposta nazionale

name: Covid ChestRay
description: We are building an open database of COVID-19 cases with chest X-ray or CT images.

name: Wikirona
description: Our shared goal is ultimately to reduce deaths and suffering by helping people get the truth, helping people not get sick, helping people to go out less, helping produce and deploy tests, helping sick people survive, helping antiviral/vaccine research, helping techincal knowledge sharing, helping enforcement of isolation policies

name: Opensource Covid Medical Supplies
description: COVID-19 Hospital Impact Model for Epidemics

name: OpenPCR
description: OpenPCR is a low-cost yet accurate thermocycler you build yourself, capable of controlling PCR reactions for DNA detection, beer spoilage, and other applications.

name: Coronavirus Tech Handbook
description: The Coronavirus Tech Handbook provides a space for technologists, civic organisations, public & private institutions, researchers and specialists of all kinds to collaborate on a rapid and sophisticated response to the coronavirus outbreak and subsequent impacts. It is a quickly evolving resource with thousands of active expert contributors.

name: Novel Corona Virus Dataset
description: Can we help mitigate the secondary effects of covid-19 by predicting its spread?

name: The Pandemic Ventilator
description: Assembly instructions for a DIY Ventilator prototype.

name: Covid Detection toolkit
description: Developing and sharing open source methodologies to safely test for the presence of SARS-CoV-2 using multiple approaches.

name: Low Resource Ventilator
description: An [IN PROGRESS] open source, low resource, quick deployment ventilator design that utilizes a bag valve mask (BVM or Ambu-bag) as a core component.

name: Pandemic Pressure Control Ventilator
description: Developing DIY, cheap, open-source pressure control ventilator (PCV) design to save millions of hospital and home pandemic patient lives

name: Low Cost Ventilator
description: Low cost ventilator for standalone use during the Covid-19 pandemic

name: Open Ventilator Registry
description: The Open Ventilator Registry project is answering the call to provide a cloud-based national registry of ventilators and the hospitals that need them most in order to facilitate their distribution during the COVID19 pandemic.

name: Covid-19 Dashboard
description: This dashboard shows recent developments of the COVID-19 pandemic. The latest open data on the COVID-19 spread are regularly downloaded and displayed in a map, summary tables, key figures and plots.

name: FoldingAtHome
description: The Folding@home efforts to better understand how the SARS-CoV-2 virus that causes COVID-19 can be targeted with small molecule and antibody therapeutics.

name: Covid-19 Testing Map
description: Map to make it easy to locate and crowd source COVID-19 testing locations

name: Covid-19 Dashboard
description: A site that displays up to date COVID-19 stats, powered by fastpages

name: Corona-Cli
description: Track the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) or the Novel Coronavirus Strain in the command line. Both worldwide for all countries, for one country, or for the US States.

name: WHO App
description: There is an urgent, global need for an official WHO App to help contain and mitigate COVID-19. The app should support the WHO efforts and be available on a worldwide basis, with information tailored to the user’s location, culture and language.

name: Covid19 Health System Capacity
description: Open geospatial work to support health systems' capacity (providers, supplies, ventilators, beds, meds) to effectively care for rapidly growing COVID19 patient needs.

name: CoronaStatus
description: Open source webapp that let people report their health status to get overview of COVID-19

name: Covid Italia
description: We share information and reports on COVID19.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Internal Dashboard
description: Internal dashboard for officials to get real-time data and updates on COVID-19 on surveillance, case tracking, and monitoring.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Surveillance Forms
description: Online forms for reporting rumored COVID-19 cases.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Bot Starter Kit
description: A basic template/starter kit for building a Messenger or Telegram bot integrated with the core Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit (ACRT) API.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: House Vacancy Bot
description: A Telegram bot that allows housing officials/owners to report vacancy to a central source and allows health works/government officials to consume that information.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Heroes Bot
description: A Telegram bot that allows frontline healthcare workers to log symptoms they are experiencing, get counseling, best practice information, logistical assistance and provide creative ways to distress.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Awareness SMS
description: Node.js wrapper for Africa’s Talking SMS API. Allows government entities to send mass SMS to text the public critical COVID-19 related information.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Awareness Website
description: A static public website that any government body can use to spread awareness about COVID-19 to their population.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: Emergency Relief Package Tracker
description: Web app that allows organizations to track and manage the distribution of emergency relief packages. Pick up and drop off can be logged via a mobile interface that captures your GPS location and plots that on a dashboard.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: API
description: Core API for Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit. Ingests and pushes data to Toolkit components.

name: Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit: AWS Infrastructure
description: AWS CloudFormation and Terraform templates to bootstrap AWS resources for Africa COVID-19 Response Toolkit projects.
